simulation

Class Cloud

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulation.Cloud
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, NeedsController.NeedsControlled

    public class Cloud
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, NeedsController.NeedsControlled
    Clouds will roam around the world sucking up water and after a set time release all the stored water.

    Cloud registers a negative provider of the need "SunLight"
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    OSM Group 5 - DollyWood project

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cloud

        public Cloud(int tickLength,
     float xPos,
     float yPos,
     float size,
     float[][] xCurrent,
     float[][] yCurrent)
        Cloud constructor
        Parameters:
        tickLength - Sets the sleep duration for the Thread
        xPos - Initial xPosition
        yPos - Initial yPosition
        size - Calculates starting tick. After a hardcoded amount of ticks the cloud will release water. This sets where to start counting
        xCurrent - A map of how strong the wind is in the x-axis at any given position.
        yCurrent - A map of how strong the wind is in the y-axis at any given position.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Starter for cloudThread This will check if it should rain or not. It will also step the cloud once during each loop
